short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simplify auto-generated document ids on Firebase Console, make them colorful and human-readable.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simplify auto-generated document ids on Firebase Console, make them colorful and human-readable. To enable docIds, please always click extension's icon on Firebase Console.
